com.tumblr.backboard

Class Actor.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tumblr.backboard.Actor.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Actor

    public static class Actor.Builder
extends Object
    Implements the builder pattern for Actor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Actor.Builder(SpringSystem springSystem, View view)
      Animates the given view with the default SpringConfig and automatically creates a SpringSystem.

        public Actor.Builder(SpringSystem springSystem,
             View view)
        Animates the given view with the default SpringConfig and automatically creates a SpringSystem.
        Parameters:
        springSystem - the spring system to use
        view - the view to animate

      • requestDisallowTouchEvent

        public Actor.Builder requestDisallowTouchEvent()
        Returns:
        flag to tell the attached View.OnTouchListener to call ViewParent.requestDisallowInterceptTouchEvent(boolean) with true.

      • dontAttachMotionListener

        public Actor.Builder dontAttachMotionListener()
        A flag to tell this Actor not to attach the touch listener to the view.
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining

      • dontAttachSpringListeners

        public Actor.Builder dontAttachSpringListeners()
        A flag to tell this builder not to attach the spring listeners to the spring. They can be added with Actor.addAllListeners().
        Returns:
        the builder for chaining

      • build

        public Actor build()
        Returns:
        Builds the Actor.
